review: She gave good suggestions around my blood report and I'm looking forward to follow it. I'll definitely recommend her.

I recently visited Dr for a persistent mouth ulcer that had been causing me significant discomfort. From the moment I stepped into the video call I felt at ease with the Doctor professional yet friendly demeanor.Doctor conducted a thorough examination and quickly diagnosed the underlying cause of my mouth ulcer. What truly impressed me was her clear and detailed explanation of the condition and the treatment plan. She prescribed the necessary medication and also provided comprehensive post-medication steps to ensure a smooth recovery and prevent future occurrences.Thanks to her expert care and guidance, my mouth ulcer healed quickly and I have been symptom-free since. review:
The Doctor patiently listened to my concerns. 
She was able to catch the severeness same as i was feeling. The medicines are helpful and has controlled my motions moderately. I will be well soon.

Thanks Doctor :)

review: Doctor was very patient and understanding. She listened all over my health issues with patience. She guided in very professional manner. I will recommend her .
Doctor patiently listens to our questions  and answers for our questions. I consulted for vaccine related queries and nicely explained.
I would definitely recommend Dr Gowthami. She is very ************* *** very much approachable whenever you need her advice.

Good experience and very friendly Doctor.
When had issues and followed up next day also doctor was very helpfull.

she Is very friendly doctor & Mainly I can say she is people's doctor with good humanity. I would like to say society needs doctors like her. we are very much happy with her the way she treat patients.. I wish all the best for her journey and poor people / middle class peoples wants this type genuine doctor.
very patient - listens to all your queries and concerns and gives well thought out responses. She has a very calming presence *** ******** **** ********** Very trustworthy doctor

review: Patiently listening to me,willing to take all questions, and inviting future queries. Offered valuable and helpful advice on the problem.
